actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill relating to the administration of antidumping and countervailing duty orders applicable to pistachio nuts.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to apply any antidumping or countervailing duty order issued under the trade relief provisions of the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to foreign grown pistachio nuts (classified under the Tariff Schedules of the United States) regardless of whether: (1) such nuts are shelled or otherwise processed before importation into the United States; or (2) such processing results in the nuts being treated under the customs laws as a foreign product.

titles.title: A bill relating to the administration of antidumping and countervailing duty orders applicable to pistachio nuts.
